00035 // This function is always called from the base class.
00036 // Here it will execute the mode we are currently running
00037 void CPassiveGalaxy::process()
00038 {
00039  (this->*processMode)();
00040 }
00041 
00042 // This will show the animation of the intro you see in every galaxy game...
00043 // Letters are big and scrolling around the screen...
00044 void CPassiveGalaxy::processIntro()
00045 {
00046  processMode = &CPassiveGalaxy::processTitle;
00047 
00048  m_BackgroundBitmap = *g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("TITLE");
00049 
00050  g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(new CPixelate(2));
00051 }
00052 
00053 // Just show the title screen with the pixelation effect
00054 void CPassiveGalaxy::processTitle()
00055 {
00056  // draw the title bitmap here!
00057  m_BackgroundBitmap.draw(g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface, 0, 0);
00058  
00059  if ( g_pInput->getPressedAnyKey() )
00060  {
00061   if(g_pGfxEngine->applyingEffects())
00062    g_pGfxEngine->killEffect();
00063   else
00064   {
00065    // Now we process the Galaxy Menu
00066    processMode = &CPassiveGalaxy::processMenu;
00067    m_BackgroundBitmap = *g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("KEENSWATCH");
00068    g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(new CColorMerge(8));
00069   }
00070  }
00071 }
00072 
00073 // This will call the menu in Passive mode and let the player choose a game
00074 // load one, changes options, etc.
00075 void CPassiveGalaxy::processMenu()
00076 {
00077  // draw the background!
00078  m_BackgroundBitmap.draw(g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface, 0, 0);
00079 
00080  mp_Menu->process();
00081 
00082  if ( g_pInput->getPressedAnyKey() )
00083  {
00084   if(g_pGfxEngine->applyingEffects())
00085    g_pGfxEngine->killEffect();
00086  }
00087 
00088  if(mp_Menu->getExitEvent())
00089  {
00090   SAFE_DELETE(mp_Menu);
00091   cleanup();
00092   m_mode = SHUTDOWN;
00093  }
00094  else if(mp_Menu->getChooseGame())
00095  {
00096   SAFE_DELETE(mp_Menu);
00097   m_modeg = true;
00098  }
00099  else if(m_restartVideo) // When some video settings has been changed
00100  {
00101   cleanup();
00102   m_restartVideo = false;
00103  }
00104  else if(mp_Menu->mustStartGame() || m_SavedGame.getCommand() == CSavedGame::LOAD) // Start a normal game
00105  {
00106   m_NumPlayers = mp_Menu->getNumPlayers();
00107   m_Difficulty = mp_Menu->getDifficulty();
00108   SAFE_DELETE(mp_Menu);
00109   cleanup();
00110   m_mode = STARTGAME;
00111  }
00112 
00113 }
00114
